key_risks: Customer concentration risk due to heavy reliance on D.R. Horton
Sensitivity to housing market fluctuations and economic conditions
Regulatory and environmental challenges, including permitting delays and opposition from environmental groups
controversies: Legal challenges, including allegations of misleading stockholders in proxy statements
Governance concerns related to reliance on D.R. Horton and past legal issues
environmental_issues: Habitat destruction and water usage concerns
Greenhouse gas emissions and waste management challenges
social_issues: Potential community opposition to development projects
governance_issues: Reliance on D.R. Horton raises questions about independence and transparency
Past legal controversies impacting investor confidence
